_source.text: After all, Tim Hardaway may be able to get you 37 assists on a road trip, but those 37 assists would be better than 37 assists from Alonzo Mourning because Zo would pick up quite a few more turnovers along the way.

text: would be **better** **than** 37 assists from **Alonzo** **Mourning** because Zo would pick up quite a few more turnovers along the way.
